question: The names of Roxas's Keyblades in Kingdom Hearts are "Oathkeeper" and "Oblivion".
It was once believed that injecting shark cartilage into people would prevent them from contracting cancer.
The T-Mobile Sidekick smartphone is a re-branded version of the Danger Hiptop.
